question:
You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate, professional responses. Make sure that the code you generate is executable and can be displayed.
Please help me implement this SVG image using code. An icon depicting a woman in a business suit with a speech bubble above her head.

checklist.title: Is the basic SVG structure correctly implemented?
checklist.description: Check if the SVG element has proper viewport dimensions, viewBox attributes, and namespace declaration. The SVG should use proper dimensioning (width/height) and coordinate system setup. Deduct 5 points if viewBox is missing, 3 points if dimensions are hardcoded without responsiveness, and 2 points if namespaces are incorrect. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the woman figure accurately depicted with proper proportions?
checklist.description: Evaluate if the code creates a professional-looking woman figure with appropriate body proportions and clear visual identification as a business professional. Check if the head, torso, and limbs are proportionally correct. Deduct 5 points if the figure looks distorted, 3 points if proportions are inconsistent, and 3 points if the business attire isn't clearly defined. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the business suit properly illustrated with professional details?
checklist.description: Examine whether the business suit has proper details like lapels, collar, sleeves, and professional styling. The suit should look professional and appropriate for a business context. Award 10 points for a detailed, well-defined business suit with proper styling, 5 points for basic representation without details, and 0 points if the business attire is not recognizable. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the speech bubble implemented correctly with proper positioning?
checklist.description: Check if the speech bubble has the correct shape with a pointer directed at the woman's head, positioned appropriately above her. The bubble should have a clear boundary and sufficient space for text. Deduct 5 points if the pointer doesn't correctly aim at the woman, 3 points if the bubble shape is irregular, and 3 points if the positioning is awkward. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the SVG code handles different viewing conditions (such as different screen sizes, browser compatibility) and provides appropriate fallbacks. Code with strong robustness should work across multiple browsers and scale properly. Award 10 points for highly robust code with responsive design and fallbacks, 5 points for average robustness, and 0 points if the SVG only works under specific conditions. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the SVG includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Subtle animations on hover 2. Color variations for different themes 3. Interactive elements in the speech bubble). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Duplicate path definitions or unnecessarily complex paths 2. Elements that don't contribute to the core visualization 3. Excessive styling that complicates the SVG without visual benefit. Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if redundant code significantly increases file size or reduces performance. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review the code organization (such as grouped elements, descriptive IDs/classes), reusability of components, and optimization techniques. Deduct 5 points if SVG elements are not properly grouped; deduct 3 points if there's no semantic naming; deduct 5 points if the SVG could be significantly optimized without visual loss. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the design follows modern icon principles: 1) Clean silhouette with recognizable form 2) Balanced negative space 3) Consistent stroke weights and styling. Deduct 3 points for visual inconsistencies, 5 points for poor contrast or readability issues, and 5 points for outdated or unprofessional styling. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the final SVG optimized and accessible?
checklist.description: Judge the SVG's technical implementation: 1) File size efficiency (under 10KB) 2) Proper use of ARIA attributes for accessibility 3) Appropriate metadata like title and description. Deduct 5 points for missing accessibility features, 3 points for unnecessary code bloat, and 5 points for missing descriptive elements. The full score is 10 points.
